ftp.server.command

Interface FTPCommand

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FTPBasicCommand, FTPCdupCommand, FTPConnectionNeededCommand, FTPCwdCommand, FTPEprtCommand, FTPEpsvCommand, FTPListCommand, FTPNlstCommand, FTPNotImplementedCommand, FTPPassCommand, FTPPasvCommand, FTPPortCommand, FTPPwdCommand, FTPQuitCommand, FTPRetrCommand, FTPStorCommand, FTPSystCommand, FTPTypeCommand, FTPUserCommand

    public interface FTPCommand
    Interface representing a FTP command
